analysis.description:
ATNLongTermHolding.start (/unique_chucks/21/0x800741bdeab833241d399d7840af5d4a2b8a3b7b.sol#273-282) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(depositStartTime == 0)

Reentrancy in ATNLongTermHolding.withdrawFor (/unique_chucks/21/0x800741bdeab833241d399d7840af5d4a2b8a3b7b.sol#366-380):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(ATN.transfer(_addr,atnAmount)) (/unique_chucks/21/0x800741bdeab833241d399d7840af5d4a2b8a3b7b.sol#372-373)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- records (/unique_chucks/21/0x800741bdeab833241d399d7840af5d4a2b8a3b7b.sol#373)

ATNLongTermHolding.tokenFallback (/unique_chucks/21/0x800741bdeab833241d399d7840af5d4a2b8a3b7b.sol#289-317) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-pool.consume(_value.mul(rate - 100).div(100)) (/unique_chucks/21/0x800741bdeab833241d399d7840af5d4a2b8a3b7b.sol#314-316)
